article_title: Growing up in Las Vegas: Sen. Marco Rubio's presidential politics
article_text: 3 rescued from deserted island after writing 'help' on beach

article_metadata.description: A lot has happened since 7th grade for Sen. Marco Rubio. First he was an up and comer in the Republican party, now he's among the top tier contenders for the 2016 party nomination.
article_metadata.title: Growing up in Las Vegas: Sen. Marco Rubio's presidential politics
